column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place was packed.  I have been told its ALWAYS packed.  When you arrive
column3: and then order your pizza.  The pizza's take about 30 minutes to make
column4: so its best to order them before you are seated
column5: otherwise you end up waiting a long time at your table.  I am sure this would be especially true on days when its extra busy.  We were finally seated on the second level.  We ordered the Malnati salad..its fantastic and I highly recommend it.  Its a green salad with dried salami chunks and a super tasty vinaigrette.  If you are into salads and like salami
column6: this is something you will definitely need to try.  This isn't your typical salami salad..its a must try!
